Key Match Events: Jake Bauers hit a walk-off RBI single in the ninth inning to give the Brewers a 2-1 victory over the Phillies
Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee Brewers' Jake Bauers expressed the intensity of the game and the pressure to win
Milwaukee closer Devin Williams struck out Philadelphia's batters in order in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee Brewers' Willy Adames celebrated the win and reflected on the team's resilience
Philadelphia Phillies' manager Rob Thomson highlighted the tight games between the two teams
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers clinched their second straight division title and sixth playoff appearance in the last seven seasons
The Phillies' magic number to qualify for the playoffs is one
